scripts.add-publish-submodule-SAMPLE: echo --Add .publish submodule-- && ( test ! -d .publish || git rm -f .publish ) && git submodule add -f git@github.com:lilliputten/flask-sample-site-1903-build.git .publish
scripts.flask-server-SAMPLE: echo --Start flask development server-- && set FLASK_ENV=development&& set FLASK_DEBUG=1&& python server.py
scripts.flask-server: echo --Start flask development server-- && python server.py
scripts.stylelint: echo --Styles linting-- && stylelint react/src/**/*.{css,pcss} --syntax scss && echo No postcss problems found
scripts.eslint: echo --JS source code linting-- && eslint react/src --ext .js,.jsx && echo No JS problems found
scripts.lint: echo --Lint all source code-- && npm-run-all eslint stylelint
scripts.test: echo --Run all lintings and tests-- && npm-run-all lint jest
scripts.help: echo --List all available script commands-- && npm-package-user-scripts-list
